description: Display cassandra node detail in OS, Cassandra and JVM blocks

panels.content:
# Cassandra Clusters
Dev: e85da24d-3f90-445e-872b-3474fa93845a-0000  
IDev: db55dc71-4dcd-439d-b194-01652cf7f7e1-0000

panels.description: Number of compactions pending. If this is trending increasingly higher, it's a good indication there is a performance issue and should be investigated.
panels.title: Pending Compactions

panels.description: Number of sstables. If this is trending increasingly higher, it's a good indication compaction isn't keeping up with the number of sstables being created, or some other performance related issue and should be investigated.
panels.title: SSTables - All

panels.description: Number of sstables. If this is trending increasingly higher, it's a good indication compaction isn't keeping up with the number of sstables being created, or some other performance related issue and should be investigated.
panels.title: SSTables

panels.description: Size, in bytes, of the on disk data size this node manages.
panels.title: Storage Load

panels.description: Number of hint messages written to this node since [re]start. Includes one entry for each host to be hinted per hint.
panels.title: Total Hints

panels.description: Number of hint messages written to this node since [re]start. Includes one entry for each host to be hinted per hint.
panels.title: Total Hints In Progress

panels.description: Number of internal exceptions caught. Under normal exceptions this should be zero.
panels.title: Cassandra Exceptions

panels.description: Current compression ratio for all SSTables.
panels.title: Compression Ratio

title: Mesos DEV Cassandra
